translations: n．家庭生活，家务琐事：与家庭、家务或家庭生活有关的事物。
· She enjoys the simple domesticities of life.
她喜欢生活中简单的家庭琐事。

sentences.sentence: There came to her a chill self-reproach that she had not returned sooner, to help her mother in these domesticities, instead of indulging herself out-of-doors .
sentences.translation: 她因为自己在外面贪恋游玩，没能早点回来，帮助母亲料理家务，问心深深有愧，只觉意趣全消。

sentences.sentence: Besides the jar of contrast there came to her a chill self-reproach that she had not returned sooner, to help her mother in these domesticities, instead of indulging herself out-of-doors.
sentences.translation: 除了对比之下引起的不愉快而外，她在心里头还产生了一阵严厉的自我责备，怪自己没有早点回来帮助母亲做些家务事情，而一直在外面贪恋玩乐。
